Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Prohibits state reimbursement of campaign and political committees and legal defense funds for payments made on behalf of the criminal or civil defense of a state employee
Summary: Prohibits state reimbursement of campaign and political committees, or legal defense funds, for payments made on behalf of the criminal or civil defense of a state employee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting reimbursement of campaign and political committees and legal defense funds for defense costs incurred on behalf of state employees
